DOC.brief_summary: Helical tomotherapy is being used to treat the prostate gland, local rates of spread and regional lymph nodes whilst sparing gross structures. The radiation to the gross disease in the prostate is hypofractionated and dose escalated. Magnetic resonance spectroscopic imaging (MRSI) is incorporated into pre- and post-treatment evaluation.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Tomotherapy in Hypofractionated/Dose Escalated Conformal Radiation Treatment for High Risk Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: High risk localized prostate cancer Low/intermediate risk, metastatic cancer Patient refusal
